projects.name: Birthday Countdown & Wisher
projects.description: Designed and developed a personalized birthday countdown website using React.js, CSS, and HTML. Implemented features to capture user input, generate unique links, and initiate real-time countdowns, delivering an interactive and engaging user experience.

projects.name: Tiffin Delivery System
projects.description: Designed and developed a user-friendly tiffin delivery platform using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Implemented intuitive navigation and a modern interface to streamline tiffin selection and ordering. Utilized MySQL for efficient order management and backend support.

projects.name: Hand Gesture Model for HCI
projects.description: Utilized OpenCV and MediaPipe with live video feed and advanced algorithms to predict and classify hand gestures in real-time, enabling navigation and actions without traditional input devices. Developed and implemented a feature for controlling the mouse cursor with two fingers, significantly enhancing user interaction and accessibility.

experiences.description: Developed and optimized PL/SQL and advanced SQL queries for client project performance management. Contributed to database development and system enhancements. Focused on query optimization to improve efficiency and system performance.

Developed and refined a database deadlock prediction model, enhancing accuracy with advanced machine learning algorithms. Conducted in-depth research on database deadlocks, analyzing machine learning techniques to identify trends and improve prediction and prevention strategies.

Established connections with daycare centers and creches across Jaipur, fostering relationships, sharing information, and promoting engagement for mutual benefits. Conducted research work for the startup and created investor pitches, supporting strategic growth and funding opportunities.
